page.title: 16AN AFTERNOON OUT
page.content: We asked some children to think of places you could go to visit in just an afternoon from Woore. The nearest place was the{Bridgemere {Wildlife Park,}where you could see lots of birds and animals and have a picnic. In Stoke there are places like the {Gladstone Pottery,}or{Chatterley {Winfield Mine.} Or you could go to {Trentham Gardens. If you just wanted to look at an old historic town, you could go to{Chester or{Nantwich}or{Shrewsbury. If you are interested in Space, you could go to{Jodrell Bank Observatory. If you want to see a film, the best place to go is{Hanley. The place that most children would like to go to is{Alton Towers. }It is not very far, but you would need to spend all day there to enjoy it all.
